header.title: DFE Frame Work - Inward File Entry

ovdesc.p: This is a LIVE table to maintain the processed file names by DFE Inward Batch Routine.
The @ID will be start with interface id and TODAY date.
The table updated with all inward file process for every day.

desc.p: This is a multi-value field updated with processed file name for all inward interfaces files processing.
Batch routine DFE.INWARD.PRE.PROCESS will do the validation and start the processing. Once the file processing was completed the file ID will be updated in this field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
